_save_dir: The location where the training results will be saved.
_scaler_model: The scaler type to use for the model data. Can be minmax or quantile.
_scaler_survey: The scaler type to use for the survey data. Can be minmax of quantile.
_add_survey_noise: Whether survey noise is added before training.
_survey_noise_scale: The scale of the Gaussian noise added to the survey measurements.
_noisygrid: Whether the measurements are taken on a noisy grid.
_parameterised: Whether the models are parametereised (9 parameter description).
_data_size: The size of the training data set.
_test_size: The size of the test data set.
_n_inputs: The number of inputs per data point to the network. The size of the model.
_n_conditional_inputs: The number of conditional inputs. The size of the survey data.
_epochs: The number of epochs to train for.
_batch_size: The amount of data going into the network at each training iteration.
_n_transforms: The number of transformations in the network.
_n_blocks_per_transform: The number of blocks per transform.
_batch_norm: Whether to normalise each batch before sending it to the network. Keep as true.
_test_freq: How many epochs pass between each testing stage.
_loss_plot_freq: How many epochs pass between each loss plot.
_early stopping: Whether to stop training when the validation loss stops evolving.
_patience: If early stopping is true, this is how many epochs we wait before stopping training.
